self_check_in_description: Enjoy flexible arrival with our convenient self check-in system — no need to coordinate with a host.
high_speed_internet_description: Stay connected with fast and reliable Wi-Fi, perfect for work or streaming.
air_conditioning_description: Keep cool and comfortable with air conditioning throughout the property.
welcome_pack_description: A small gift to start your stay — snacks, drinks, or a local surprise to make you feel at home.
local_guide_description: Get insider tips with our custom local guide featuring food spots, attractions, and hidden gems.
safety_box_description: A secure place to store your valuables during your stay.
smart_tv_description: Relax with a Smart TV offering access to your favorite streaming services.
board_games_description: Enjoy a cozy night in with a selection of classic board games for all ages.
